item.description:
Meet outside of the station on Causeway Street.

From the AMC book Walk Boston, "this walk takes you through the town's compact heart and past its most colorful and historic sites. You'll also take in architecture from the Federal period to the present, dramatic topography with stunning views of city and harbor, and national landmarks such as the Bunker Hill Monument and the USS Constitution."

The walk ends at the Sullivan Square T station. We will hop on the T back to North Station and go for lunch at

Hurricane O'Reilly's
150 Canal Street, Boston, MA
Phone: (617) 722-0161
item.name: Explore Chrlestown walk
